net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.model

Class AbstractNamedEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.model.AbstractEntity
      • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.model.AbstractNamedEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Entity<Long>, NamedEntity<Long>, net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedNamedObject, NamedObject

    @MappedSuperclass
public abstract class AbstractNamedEntity
extends AbstractEntity
implements NamedEntity<Long>
    An Entity that has a name and description. This is only used for convenience, and should always be maintained as transparent to persistence code in case a subclass needs to be refactored to not use this class.
    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getName

        public LocalizedObjectKey getName()
        Get the Name. Should be presentable to users and never used as an ID. Uses null to represent empty string.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface NamedEntity<Long>
        Specified by:
